title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 393.4 - Calculating present value of disability award
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 393.4 - Calculating present value of disability award

State Regulations

In calculating the present value of a disability award for
payment into the aggregate trust fund, the actuary shall assume in all cases
that there will be dependents entitled to the unpaid balance of such an award
should the injured claimant die before the expiration of the award from causes
not related to the original injury. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
393.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
